summary:
::: EXECUTIVE :::

Financially and operationally driven executive with an exceptional blend of financial management, strategic business planning, and IT management capabilities for globally operating entities. 

Demonstrated success overseeing the build and management of strong operating infrastructures, leading process improvement, and implementing methodologies and controls to mitigate operating risk, drive revenue growth, and capture cost reductions. 

Expertise includes leading the transition, reorganization, and structure of underperforming entities to enhance performance, optimize returns, and maximize growth.

Possess vast financial, business, and market acumen to produce extraordinary results with the ability to generate profit in volatile markets while effectively managing risk. 

Adept at building relationships with cross-functional internal and external business partners, associates, and key decision-makers and identifying and implementing creative solutions to achieve organizational goals. 

Fluent in English and German, proficient in Spanish, and basic French capabilities.


::: CAREER HIGHLIGHTS :::

--> Served as the face of the METRO Group in 2011 for the German Testimonial Campaign.
--> Named, by Actualidad Económica and KPMG, as one of the top 100 Finance Directors in Spain two successive years.


::: SIGNATURE STRENGTHS :::

•	Strategic Business Planning
•	Change Management/Turnaround
•	Revenue/Profit Growth
•	Profit & Loss Management
•	Leadership/Staff Development
•	Merger & Acquisition/Integration

education.field_of_study: Economics and Finance/International Business Certificate/French Minor

profile_positions.title: Chief Human Resources Officer Europe & Indonesia

profile_positions.description:
Tenure at Metro Group spans from 2000-2022

As CEO - Metro Cash & Carry - Italia (2018-2022)

As CEO - Makro Cash & Carry - Portugal (2014-2018)

• Successfully spearheaded turnaround of the Portugal business unit
• Appointed to Diversity Council within Metro Group and advised on roadmap development for the corporate inclusion and diversity program.
profile_positions.title: CEO | BOARD MEMBER

profile_positions.description:
As Director, Finance and Board Member – Makro Cash & Carry – Iberia Unit (2012-2014)

• Championed the integration of all departments, processes, and procedures across Spain and Portugal while managing the unique complexities of two separate organizations and legal entities.
• Participated in turnaround efforts of the Portugal business unit by defining and implementing enhanced financial controls and standards, leading an IT infrastructure integration, introducing the SAP Credit Management Module, transitioning invoice control to a shared service center, maintaining Spain’s profitability level.

As Board Member, Valencia Trading Office - Spain (2011-2016)

• Serve as an integral member of the senior leadership team.
• Define and execute corporate vision and start-up functions for new business for a trading office providing fruit and vegetables to Metro Group entities.

As Director, Finance and Board Member – Makro Cash & Carry – Spain (2010-2012):

• Led the IT infrastructure transition subsequent to head office and infrastructure relocation and mitigated associated risk through proper planning and execution.
• Implemented the MMS Store, a group developed goods management system, securing buy-in from key opinion leaders on the system’s benefits and managing general resistance to system change.

As Director, Finance and Board Member – Makro Cash & Carry – Hungary (2008-2012):

• Defined and deployed processes and procedures to implement customer delivery services.
• Led tender for partner efforts for logistic services by teaming with supply chain staff in outlining service requirements, evaluating results, and selecting a partner.
profile_positions.title: DIRECTOR, FINANCE | BOARD MEMBER

profile_positions.description:
ENTERPRISE IMPACT:

As Head, Controlling – Makro Cash & Carry – United Kingdom (2005-2008):

• Championed a turnaround initiative successfully leading cost cutting initiatives and assessing store closing options, as warranted, receiving recognition for achievement and success from executive management. 
• Determined economic value added and drafted investment proposals to achieve corporate goals.

As Head, Controlling – Makro Cash & Carry – Romania (2003-2005):

• Played integral role in expansion planning of four new openings per year as well as conducting a feasibility study for market entry into Moldova followed by successful opening.




Achieved early career success in roles as Senior Department Manager, Metro Cash & Carry International, Germany (2001-2003), International Controller and EVA Project Assistant, Metro Cash & Carry International, Germany (2000-2001), Associate Attorney, Wildman, Harrold, Allen & Dixon, Chicago, Illinois, USA (1998-1999), Summer Associate, Wildman, Harrold, Allen & Dixon, Chicago, Illinois, USA (1997). Summer Associate, Briggs & Morgan, P.A., Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA (1996).
